targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auth_audit_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND activity_type='login' AND success=false;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT client_ip) FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND status_code IN (401,403,429);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND status_code=429;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN user_id ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN user_id ELSE NULL END) FROM gateway_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '24 hours';

SELECT a.created_at, a.activity_type, u.email as user_email, a.client_ip, a.success, a.method, a.path, a.status_code FROM auth_audit_logs a LEFT JOIN auth_users u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.created_at>now()-interval '24 hours' AND (a.success=false OR a.activity_type IN ('password_reset', 'account_locked')) ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT 'NIN Verifications' as data_type, COUNT(*) as total_requests, COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code=200 THEN 1 END) as successful, 'NDPR Compliant' as compliance_status FROM nin_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' UNION ALL SELECT 'BVN Verifications', COUNT(*), COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code=200 THEN 1 END), 'CBN Compliant' FROM bvn_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' UNION ALL SELECT 'SMS Messages', COUNT(*), COUNT(CASE WHEN status_code=200 THEN 1 END), 'NCC Compliant' FROM sms_access_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days';

SELECT date_trunc('hour', created_at) as time, COUNT(CASE WHEN success=true THEN 1 END) as successful_logins, COUNT(CASE WHEN success=false THEN 1 END) as failed_logins FROM auth_audit_logs WHERE created_at>now()-interval '7 days' AND activity_type='login' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
